input: <web-search>Find current information about: landing page strategy gallery pricing table responsive design patterns 2026</web-search>
output:
Based on the latest 2026 research, here are the key landing page design trends and strategies:

## Design Patterns & Strategy

**Clean, Focused Layouts**: Modern landing pages strip away unnecessary elements, using generous whitespace, minimal navigation, and a single prominent CTA. The focus has shifted to personality, interactivity, and conversion-focused storytelling.

**Product-Led Storytelling**: Landing pages now function as revenue assets that influence customer acquisition cost (CAC), pipeline quality, and sales velocity through buyer-aligned messaging.

## Responsive Design

**Mobile-First Approach**: Design starts with mobile considerations—fast loading times, adaptive layouts, thumb-friendly buttons, and minimalist content that scales seamlessly across devices.

**Interactive Components**: Screenshots have evolved into embedded product previews, video demos, and guided tours placed directly in hero sections to build trust and engagement.

## Visual & UI Elements

**Typography**: Oversized, expressive fonts paired with concise, high-impact headlines. Supporting copy is tight and scannable.

**Dark Mode**: High-contrast themes are mainstream in 2026, with brands offering both light and dark mode versions for improved accessibility and modern aesthetics.

**Minimal Motion**: Purposeful animations that add meaning without distraction—subtle movements that guide attention and enhance user experience.

## Pricing Tables

Pricing pages are among the most visited yet most overlooked pages. Best practices include clear pricing tiers, responsive table designs that adapt to mobile screens, and transparent feature comparisons.

## Landing Page Builders with Gallery Features

- **Unbounce**: Conversion-optimized responsive templates with drag-and-drop builder
- **Leadpages**: Starting at $49/month, unlimited traffic and leads
- **Landingi**: 300+ templates in gallery

## Key Takeaway

The best 2026 landing pages prioritize speed, AI-powered personalization, mobile-first layouts, and clear conversion paths without clutter.

Sources:
- [20 Landing Page Examples That Actually Convert in 2026](https://www.superside.com/blog/landing-page-design-examples)
- [The 7 Best Landing Page Builders For 2026](https://www.searchenginejournal.com/the-7-best-landing-page-builders-for-2026/561935/)
- [12 Best Landing Page Builders in 2026 (Free & Paid)](https://www.emailvendorselection.com/best-landing-page-builders/)
- [10 Best Landing Page Designs in 2026 [Key Takeaways]](https://www.thethunderclap.com/blog/best-landing-page-designs)
- [Landing Page Design Trends by Industry (2026 Guide)](https://www.involve.me/blog/landing-page-design-trends)
- [10 Best Landing Page Design Examples for 2026](https://www.shopify.com/blog/landing-page-design)
- [10 SaaS Landing Page Trends for 2026 (with Real Examples)](https://www.saasframe.io/blog/10-saas-landing-page-trends-for-2026-with-real-examples)
- [Top Landing Page Design Trends for B2B SaaS in 2026](https://www.saashero.net/content/top-landing-page-design-trends/)
- [9 Landing Page Trends For 2026](https://www.involve.me/blog/landing-page-trends)

input: <web-search>Find current information about: document image augmentation OCR text similarity 2024</web-search>
output:
Based on the latest research from 2024, here are the key developments in document image augmentation for OCR and text similarity:

## Key Techniques

**Generative Data Augmentation**
- **ScrabbleGAN** is being used to generate synthetic images that replicate fonts from original documents, improving OCR model performance
- **OCR2SEQ** introduces multi-modal generative augmentation that simulates realistic text extraction errors, creating diverse training scenarios for sequence-to-sequence models

**TextImage Augmentation**
A new approach combining:
- Text-level augmentation: Random Insertion, Deletion, Swap, and Stopword Replacement
- Visual distortion on images
- Creates datasets with semantically similar textual content and visually distorted images

**Transformer-Based Models**
- TrOCR (Transformer-based OCR) models are showing strong performance
- KerasOCR benefits significantly from data augmentation techniques
- Document Text Recognition (docTR) provides seamless, high-performing OCR capabilities

**Text Similarity Measurement**
For evaluating OCR accuracy, researchers are using:
- **Sentence-BERT (SBERT)** framework with cosine similarity scores
- **MiniLM-L12-v2** multilingual paraphrase model to compute similarity between OCR output and ground truth
- This allows for semantic comparison rather than just character-level accuracy

**Specialized Augmentation for Scene Text**
STRAug provides image transformations specifically designed for Scene Text Recognition data augmentation, addressing challenging real-world scenarios.

The trend shows a shift toward combining traditional image augmentation with semantic text similarity measures and generative AI approaches to create more robust OCR systems.

Sources:
- [Leveraging Transformer-Based OCR Model with Generative Data Augmentation for Engineering Document Recognition](https://www.mdpi.com/2079-9292/14/1/5)
- [Introducing TextImage Augmentation for Document Images](https://huggingface.co/blog/doc_aug_hf_alb)
- [Advancing machine learning with OCR2SEQ: an innovative approach to multi-modal data augmentation](https://journalofbigdata.springeropen.com/articles/10.1186/s40537-024-00927-4)
- [Effective Data Augmentation for OCR](https://towardsdatascience.com/effective-data-augmentation-for-ocr-8013080aa9fa/)
- [GitHub - mindee/doctr](https://github.com/mindee/doctr)
- [GitHub - roatienza/straug](https://github.com/roatienza/straug)
- [PreP-OCR: A Complete Pipeline for Document Image Restoration and Enhanced OCR Accuracy](https://arxiv.org/html/2505.20429v1)

input: <web-search>Find current information about: 한국 정부사이트 PDF 다운로드 curl SSL_ERROR_SYSCALL 해결 2026</web-search>
output:
검색 결과를 기반으로 한국 정부사이트에서 PDF 다운로드 시 발생하는 `curl SSL_ERROR_SYSCALL` 오류에 대한 해결 방법을 안내해드리겠습니다.

## SSL_ERROR_SYSCALL 오류 원인

이 오류는 주로 다음과 같은 경우에 발생합니다:
- 서버가 SSL 연결을 적절하게 종료하지 않을 때 (no "close notify")
- OpenSSL 3.2 이상 버전과 구형 서버 간의 호환성 문제
- SSL 인증서 검증 실패 또는 신뢰할 수 없는 인증 기관

## 해결 방법

### 1. **curl 옵션 사용**
```bash
# SSL 검증 우회 (테스트 목적으로만 사용)
curl -k -O [PDF_URL]

# 또는 --insecure 옵션
curl --insecure -O [PDF_URL]

# 상세 디버그 정보 확인
curl -vvv [PDF_URL]
```

### 2. **CA 인증서 지정**
```bash
# 특정 CA 인증서 파일 지정
curl --cacert /path/to/ca-bundle.crt -O [PDF_URL]

# 시스템 CA 번들 사용
curl --cacert /etc/ssl/certs/ca-certificates.crt -O [PDF_URL]
```

### 3. **시스템에 CA 인증서 추가**
한국 정부 사이트의 CA 인증서를 시스템의 신뢰할 수 있는 인증서 목록에 추가하는 것이 가장 안전한 방법입니다.

### 4. **OpenSSL/curl 버전 확인**
```bash
# curl 버전 확인
curl --version

# OpenSSL 버전 확인
openssl version
```

구형 서버와의 호환성 문제인 경우, curl/OpenSSL 버전을 조정하거나 업데이트가 필요할 수 있습니다.

### 5. **방화벽 설정 확인**
- 방화벽에서 인증 기관 URL과 포트가 차단되어 있는지 확인
- HTTPS(443 포트) 트래픽이 허용되어 있는지 확인

## 권장 사항

한국 정부 사이트는 때때로 구형 SSL/TLS 설정을 사용할 수 있으므로:
1. 가능하면 해당 사이트의 CA 인증서를 시스템에 추가하는 것이 가장 안전합니다
2. `-k` 옵션은 보안상 권장되지 않으므로 프로덕션 환경에서는 피해야 합니다
3. 최신 버전의 curl과 OpenSSL 사용을 권장합니다

Sources:
- ["OpenSSL SSL_read: SSL_ERROR_SYSCALL" with OpenSSL ≥ 3.2 + old servers · Issue #17471 · curl/curl](https://github.com/curl/curl/issues/17471)
- [SSL 보안서버 인증서 오류 및 장애 해결방안](https://help.ucert.co.kr/42355d89-68ba-41d4-ba98-b9a2b2e15688)
- [OpenSSL SSL_connect: SSL_ERROR_SYSCALL in connection · Issue #14154 · curl/curl](https://github.com/curl/curl/issues/14154)
- [curl 에 신뢰하는 인증기관 인증서(CA Cert) 추가하기](https://www.lesstif.com/gitbook/curl-ca-cert-15892500.html)
- [[리눅스] curl: (60) SSL certificate problem: unable to get local issuer certificate](https://velog.io/@hyojinnnnnan/%EB%A6%AC%EB%88%85%EC%8A%A4-curl-60-SSL-certificate-problem-unable-to-get-local-issuer-certificate)

trajectory.content: I'll search for current information about resolving SSL_ERROR_SYSCALL issues when downloading PDFs from Korean government websites using curl.

### 5. **방화벽 설정 확인**
- 방화벽에서 인증 기관 URL과 포트가 차단되어 있는지 확인
- HTTPS(443 포트) 트래픽이 허용되어 있는지 확인

## 권장 사항

2. `-k` 옵션은 보안상 권장되지 않으므로 프로덕션 환경에서는 피해야 합니다
3. 최신 버전의 curl과 OpenSSL 사용을 권장합니다

Sources:
- ["OpenSSL SSL_read: SSL_ERROR_SYSCALL" with OpenSSL ≥ 3.2 + old servers · Issue #17471 · curl/curl](https://github.com/curl/curl/issues/17471)
- [SSL 보안서버 인증서 오류 및 장애 해결방안](https://help.ucert.co.kr/42355d89-68ba-41d4-ba98-b9a2b2e15688)
- [OpenSSL SSL_connect: SSL_ERROR_SYSCALL in connection · Issue #14154 · curl/curl](https://github.com/curl/curl/issues/14154)
- [curl 에 신뢰하는 인증기관 인증서(CA Cert) 추가하기](https://www.lesstif.com/gitbook/curl-ca-cert-15892500.html)
- [[리눅스] curl: (60) SSL certificate problem: unable to get local issuer certificate](https://velog.io/@hyojinnnnnan/%EB%A6%AC%EB%88%85%EC%8A%A4-curl-60-SSL-certificate-problem-unable-to-get-local-issuer-certificate)

input: <web-search>How do I find information about: pendlay row deficit tutorial youtube 2026?</web-search>
output:
I found several helpful resources about deficit Pendlay row tutorials. Here's what's available:

## What is a Deficit Pendlay Row?

The deficit Pendlay row is a variation where you stand on an elevated platform (weight plates or aerobic stepper) while performing the Pendlay row. This increases the range of motion, allowing for a deeper stretch and more muscle stimulation in your back.

## Key Resources Found:

**Comprehensive Guides:**
- Complete how-to guides with form tips, benefits, and programming advice
- Expert breakdowns covering muscles worked, common mistakes, and variations
- Pro tips for maximizing back development and pulling strength

**Video Content:**
- While I found references to TikTok videos showing the deficit Pendlay row technique, specific 2026 YouTube tutorials weren't prominently featured in the results
- I recommend searching directly on YouTube with "deficit Pendlay row tutorial" to find the most recent video content

## Important Notes:
- Requires good hamstring flexibility and mobility
- Torso should remain parallel to the floor throughout
- Bar returns to the floor between each rep
- Increases time under tension for greater muscle growth

**Sources:**
- [Deficit Pendlay Rows Guide: How To, Benefits, Programming, Variations](https://fitnessvolt.com/deficit-pendlay-rows-guide/)
- [How to Do the Pendlay Row for Back Size and Stronger Lifts | BarBend](https://barbend.com/pendlay-row/)
- [How to do the Pendlay Row: Form, Muscles Worked, Pro Tips](https://backmusclesolutions.com/blogs/the-ql-blawg/pendlay-row)
- [Pendlay Row: How-to, Benefits, Variations, Mistakes & More](https://www.hevyapp.com/exercises/pendlay-row/)
- [Good Idea or Bad? Deficit Pendlay Row - Christian Thibaudeau Coaching - T NATION](https://t-nation.com/t/good-idea-or-bad-deficit-pendlay-row/242657)
- [How to Do the Pendlay Row: Expert Tips | Garage Gym Reviews](https://www.garagegymreviews.com/pendlay-row)
- [Deficit Pendlay Row for the #backgains #hypertrophytraining #strongback | TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@ryanrosenthalfitness/video/7465891413687881003)
- [Pendlay Row: Build Explosive Back Strength & Strict Power-Row Technique — Dumbbells Direct](https://dumbbellsdirect.com/blogs/barbell-exercisesspecific-movements/pendlay-row)

input: <web-search>Find current information about: CFTC commitments of traders current week report 2025 download txt file</web-search>
output:
Based on the search results, I can help you find the current CFTC Commitments of Traders report for 2025 in text format.

## Key Information:

**Release Schedule**: COT reports are released every Friday at 3:30 PM Eastern time, containing data from the previous Tuesday. Since today is January 23, 2025, the most recent report would contain data from January 21, 2025.

## Where to Download:

1. **Main COT Page**: Visit the official CFTC Commitments of Traders page to access current and historical reports
   
2. **Public Reporting Environment**: CFTC's modern data portal (launched October 2022) allows you to customize, filter, and download report data in various formats

3. **Historical Viewable Reports**: Access static format reports organized by week and compressed annual files

## Report Types Available:

- **Legacy Report** - Data back to January 15, 1986
- **CIT Report** - Data back to January 3, 2006  
- **Disaggregated Reports** - Data back to June 13, 2006
- **Trader in Financial Futures** - Data back to June 13, 2006

The CFTC provides these reports in text file formats that can be downloaded directly from their website or through their public reporting portal for analysis.

**Sources:**
- [Commitments of Traders | CFTC](https://www.cftc.gov/MarketReports/CommitmentsofTraders/index.htm)
- [Release Schedule | CFTC](https://www.cftc.gov/MarketReports/CommitmentsofTraders/ReleaseSchedule/index.htm)
- [Commitments of Traders | The Commodities Futures Trading Commission](https://publicreporting.cftc.gov/stories/s/Commitments-of-Traders/r4w3-av2u/)
- [Historical Viewable | CFTC](https://www.cftc.gov/MarketReports/CommitmentsofTraders/HistoricalViewable/index.htm)
